title: Arumukhat-tArakanE
sahitya:
arumukhat-tArakanE anbarai Adarikkum udAranE


anupallavi

  pArinil bhaktarai pAlittaruLvadil vEru nighar illAda sIruDan sirappOnE


caraNam    sUranaik-kUru sheidu pArinaik-kAttavanE sIrazhinda suranin tIvinai tIrttavanE
Ariru karattAlum aDiyArin iDar tIra vAri vArip-pEraruLai vazhangiDum vaLLalE
